title: What does the new Mazda typeface look like?
content:
After reading [this article](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416071947/http:/www.mazda.com/publicity/release/2008/200806/080619.html) I'd like to know what the new typeface actually looks like. Anyone got anything?

—K
author: kris

comments.content:
Mazda's Japanese site has just relaunched yesterday. I'm not sure this is one or not, but you can see it below link.  
"MAZDA BIANTE"  
 [http://www.mazda.co.jp/normal.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416071947/http:/www.mazda.co.jp/normal.html "http://www.mazda.co.jp/normal.html")  
And you can see another name if you would reload this page.  
"MAZDA DEMIO" "MAZDA ATENZA"

This Japanese article is the same one you read.  
 [http://www.mazda.co.jp/corporate/publicity/release/2008/200806/080619.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416071947/http:/www.mazda.co.jp/corporate/publicity/release/2008/200806/080619.html "http://www.mazda.co.jp/corporate/publicity/release/2008/200806/080619.html")  
I think "NEWS FROM MAZDA" is the new typeface.
so its pretty much a thin italic version of SF Automaton (the logo font) by the looks of it?
